info.name: Hyphenate APIs
info.description:
You can leverage this REST API interfaces for testing. For more details about server implementation, request rate limitation, etc, please visit [Hyphenate Server Integration](https://docs.hyphenate.io/docs/server-overview). 

**Note:**

`org_ID` is the unique ID of the organization created when you first registered [Hyphenate console](https://console.hyphenate.io/).                         
`app_name` is the unique app ID created when you new application in [Hyphenate console](https://console.hyphenate.io/).           
`Authorization token` is required for most API requests as part of requesting header in the format `Bearer ${token}`. You can obtain the token via [/{org_name}/{app_name}/token](https://docs.hyphenate.io/docs/server-overview#section-request-authentication-token).

exec: tests["Response time is less than 200ms"] = responseTime < 200;

request.description: All of the Hyphenate API endpoints requires authentication token for session, unless specified otherwise.
Get Unix time https://www.epochconverter.com/

item.name: Add Chat Room Members in Batch

request.description: Add max 60 group members at a time.

item.name: Remove Chat Room Members in Batch

request.description:
Group settings:
1. Group name
2. Group description
3. Public vs. Private Group
4. Max number of member (including admin)
5. If public group, allow join freely vs. require permission from admin
6. allowinvites property. If public group, then allowinvites is false. If private group, then allowinvites is true. 

group body:
{
  "groupname": "group_name",	// group name. 
  "desc": "group description",	// group description
  "public": true,				// group type, public vs. private. Public group is searchable, private requires invitation.
  "maxusers": 0,				// max number of group member, excluding owner and admin. 
  "approval": true,				// if require approval to join the group
  "owner": "owner_username",	// The owner (admin) of the group
  "members": [					// (Optional) add user to group members, excluding owner. Ignore if not needed.
    "user1"
  ]
}

The message body only allows groupname, description, and maxusers.

Note: Use '+' to replace space if modifying groupname ​and description. E.g., use "test+group" instead of "test group".

Warning: If group cannot be found or operation failed, then the response will still return HTTP code 200, but key-value are "maxusers"=false, "groupname"=false, and "description"=false.

Block multiple group members by adding the users to the group blacklist. Max 60 users at a time. Blocked users will receive an event, "You are kicked out of the group {groupid}". Blocked user will not able to see nor receive group message.

Block a group member by adding the user to the group blacklist. 
Blocked user will receive an event, "You are kicked out of the group {groupid}".
Blocked user will not able to see nor  receive group message.
Unblock group member by removing the user from group blacklist.

item.name: Get a List of Members of Group

request.description: Get the blacklist of blocked users. Blocked user cannot see nor receive group message.
Warning: Add max 60 members once at a time.

item.name: Remove multiple Member from the Group
Remove a Member from the Group

request.description: Transfer group ownership by changing owner.

Important:
1. Include the share-secret from HTTP header 
2. Include uuid from the response of a successful file uploading, which is the file identifier

Warning: File cannot be over 10MB, otherwise will fail.
Important: Be sure keep the "uuid" and "share-secret", which are requirement when downloading particular file.
Get a list of users

Register an IM user account respects to org and app keys. 
Note: There're 2 types of registration, 'open' and 'authorized'. 'open' registration does not require admin authentication, but 'authorized' does. See the application -> "overview" -> "User Registration Permission" in Hyphenate console. 
'Authorized' registration is recommended, which prevents malicious attempt to create junk user account from the ones obtained the URL.

Delete total number of N user accounts in batch. Recommend set N range 100\x7e500 at a time to ensure the performance. Cannot specified user account in deletion, check the response to see which user accounts are deleted.

item.name: Get a List of Blocked Users

request.description: Get a List of Blocked Users by the user.

body.raw: Users to be blocked. Use ',' to separate the usernames

request.description: Block one or multiple users by adding to blacklist. Blocked user cannot send message.
Unblock one or multiple users by removing them from blacklist. Max 60 users at a time.
Get user's contact list
Add contact for user. Contact to be added must under the same application as the user.
Remove contact from user's contact list.
Get the number of offline messages

body.raw: update APNs display name by key "nickname"

request.description: Update user's APNs display name for iOS push notification.
Warning: Delete a user will also delete the group and chat room if the specified user is the admin of the group and chat room.
Activate a deactivated user account.
Deactivate a user account. User will not be able to login.
Force logout a user

Get All the Chat Rooms of User Joined

request.description: Get Undelivered message status via message ID.

body.raw: Set a new password by using key "newpassword"

request.description: To enhance security, we recommend update user's Hyphenate IM user account password if the user's app password on developer server is updated.
